doc:
George Nichols (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Nichols_(actor) 0 George Nichols (October 28, 1864 – September 20, 1927) was an American actor and film director. He appeared in 221 films between 1908 and 1928. He also directed 103 films between 1911 and 1916. He was born in Rockford, Illinois and died in Hollywood, California. He, along with Henry "Pathe" Lehrman, became an arch-enemy of Charlie Chaplin, who would take direction from nobody while at Keystone Studios. 'Pops', as he was known, was often cast as father to Mabel Normand. George_Nichols ( October_28_,_1864 – September_20_,_1927 ) was an_American_actor_and_film_director . He appeared in 221_films between 1908_and_1928 . He also directed 103_films between 1911_and_1916 . He was_born in Rockford , Illinois and died in Hollywood , California . He , along with Henry_"_Pathe_"_Lehrman , became an_arch-enemy of Charlie_Chaplin , who would_take direction from nobody while at Keystone_Studios . ' Pops ' , as he was_known , was_often_cast as father to Mabel_Normand .
